page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT IN CARLTON
page.content: Ours is a{rural area.}There are many farms in our{area}where few people work.Many of the people in our block work somewhere other than the village they live in.From{Wallingwells most people work in Carlton.From {Carlton}most people work in the near by towns of{Worksop}or Retford.Some people work in{industrial estate}up Lawn Road in Carlton.The estate is small and only has twelve firms.They produce{marble, metal,stone and {materials for building.}Some{factories only employ ten people.Many miners live in Carlton,because there used to be a colliery called{Firbeck}pit which has been closed down.Most of the miners were moved to other pits.When people in a village work elsewhere it is called a{Dormer}Village.Letwell is a good example because{7 out of 10 {villagers}work outside Letwell.
